                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Serena Williams eats dog food, instantly regrets it
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/serena-williams-eats-dog-food-instantly-regrets-it</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 13:39:24 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/serena-williams-eats-dog-food-instantly-regrets-it</guid>
                        <description>The gourmet food Serena Williams ordered off the hotel room-service menu for dogs looked good enough for her to eat. So the top-ranked tennis player sampled it, and later got sick.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297835118289_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                                <id>urn:canoe:article:1297835118317</id>
                                <updated>2016-05-12T13:39:24Z</updated>
                                <title><p>The Associated Press</p></title>
                                <rights>sunmedia.ca</rights>
                        </source>
                        <accessType>AccessPublic</accessType>
                        <isPaywall>false</isPaywall>
                    </item>
                
            
                
                    
                        
































	


                    
                    
                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Russians at Sochi Olympics were part of doping program -- report
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/russians-at-sochi-olympics-were-part-of-doping-program-report</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:59:13 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/russians-at-sochi-olympics-were-part-of-doping-program-report</guid>
                        <description>Dozens of Russian athletes who competed at the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics, including at least 15 medal winners, were part of a state-run doping program, the New York Times reported on Thursday.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297835083577_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        <source>
                                <id>urn:canoe:article:1297835083680</id>
                                <updated>2016-05-12T12:59:13Z</updated>
                                <title><p>Reuters</p></title>
                                <rights>sunmedia.ca</rights>
                        </source>
                        <accessType>AccessPublic</accessType>
                        <isPaywall>false</isPaywall>
                    </item>

                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Gay soccer referee quits after enduring insults at games
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/gay-soccer-referee-quits-after-enduring-insults-at-games</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:11:26 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/gay-soccer-referee-quits-after-enduring-insults-at-games</guid>
                        <description>A gay Spanish soccer referee says he is giving up the job after repeatedly being the target of verbal abuse at games because of his sexual orientation.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297835065528_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                    </item>
                
            
                
                    
                        
































	


                    
                    
                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Scott Skiles resigns after one year as coach of Magic
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/scott-skiles-resigns-after-one-year-as-coach-of-magic</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:53:33 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/scott-skiles-resigns-after-one-year-as-coach-of-magic</guid>
                        <description>Scott Skiles has stepped down as coach of the Orlando Magic after just one year, the somewhat surprising decision coming about a month after the conclusion of a frustrating regular season.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297835052567_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                                <title><p>The Associated Press</p></title>
                                <rights>sunmedia.ca</rights>
                        </source>
                        <accessType>AccessPublic</accessType>
                        <isPaywall>false</isPaywall>
                    </item>

                        <description>Olympic gold medallist Beckie Scott gave a speech Thursday that reminded all the leaders at the World Anti-Doping Agency why they're doing all this work.</description>

                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Marchand and Gallagher go from foes to fast friends at worlds
                            
                            
                                [Video]
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/marchand-and-gallagher-go-from-foes-to-fast-friends-at-worlds</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:26:15 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/12/marchand-and-gallagher-go-from-foes-to-fast-friends-at-worlds</guid>
                        <description>Brendan Gallagher said he was only joking. He wasn't actually going to "jump" Brad Marchand when he wasn't looking — something he promised to do if a Team Canada Twitter campaign aimed at getting Connor McDavid on the cover of NHL 17 received 10,000 re-tweets. But he also didn't want to break his word.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297834979678_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                        <accessType>AccessMetered</accessType>
                        <isPaywall>true</isPaywall>
                    </item>

                        <description>There is something that happens at the Air Canada Centre when Bismack Biyombo gets on a roll. Biyombo is a fan favourite coming off the bench or starting.</description>

                    <item>
                        <title>

                        </title>

                        <description>DALLAS — It was the pot that took turns moving from back burner to front all through the Western Conference semifinal, but it was always there on the stovetop, bubbling.</description>

                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Scherzer strikes out 20 to tie MLB record in Nationals win
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/scherzer-strikes-out-20-to-tie-mlb-record-in-nationals-win</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 21:21:00 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/scherzer-strikes-out-20-to-tie-mlb-record-in-nationals-win</guid>
                        <description>WASHINGTON — Max Scherzer struck out 20 batters, matching the major league record for a nine-inning game as he pitched the Washington Nationals past the Detroit Tigers 3-2 on Wednesday night.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297834881480_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        <source>
                                <id>urn:canoe:article:1297834881508</id>
                                <updated>2016-05-11T21:21:00Z</updated>
                                <title><p>THE ASSOCIATED PRESS</p></title>
                                <rights>sunmedia.ca</rights>
                        </source>
                        <accessType>AccessPublic</accessType>
                        <isPaywall>false</isPaywall>
                    </item>
                
            
                
                    
                        
































	


                    
                    
                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Well … draft grabs take a while to sort out, but here’s Calgary Sun's Scott Mitchell’s lowdown
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/well--draft-grabs-take-a-while-to-sort-out-but-heres-calgary-suns-scott-mitchells-lowdown</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:58:17 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/well--draft-grabs-take-a-while-to-sort-out-but-heres-calgary-suns-scott-mitchells-lowdown</guid>
                        <description>In order to properly grade a draft, you have to wait anywhere from three to five years.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297833587461_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                    </item>
                
            
                
                    
                        
































	


                    
                    
                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Calgary Stampeders draft pick has been through tougher circumstances than a CFL tra
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/calgary-stampeders-draft-pick-has-been-through-tougher-circumstances-than-a-cfl-tra</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:51:22 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/calgary-stampeders-draft-pick-has-been-through-tougher-circumstances-than-a-cfl-tra</guid>
                        <description>The prospect of a gruelling CFL training camp as a mid-round pick isn’t exactly daunting.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297834870932_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>

                    <item>
                        <title>
                            Jays lose to Giants in extras, blow opportunity for series sweep
                            
                            
                            
                        </title>
                        
                        <link>http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/blue-jays-lose-to-giants-in-extras-blow-opportunity-for-series-sweep</link>
                        
                        <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:19:59 MDT</pubDate>
                        
                        <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.calgarysun.com/2016/05/11/blue-jays-lose-to-giants-in-extras-blow-opportunity-for-series-sweep</guid>
                        <description>SAN FRANCISCO — The Blue Jays blew an opportunity for a series sweep here Wednesday afternoon and, for once, the failure didn't land on the doorstep of the bullpen.</description>
                        
                            <media:content url="http://storage.calgarysun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297834817190_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80" type="image/jpeg" height="100" width="200"/>
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        <source>
                                <id>urn:canoe:article:1297834817218</id>
                                <updated>2016-05-11T20:19:59Z</updated>
                                <title>Ken Fidlin</title>
                                <rights>sunmedia.ca</rights>
                        </source>
